title: Asim Kurd felicitates caretaker PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP):Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar Monday here held a meeting with former provincial minister Mir Asim Kurd Gello.Asim Kurd Gello felicitated the prime minister on assuming the office and expressed his best wishes for him.
